knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
Datos <- read.table("./data/Diabetes.csv", sep = ";", header = TRUE)
```



```{r}
# Histograma pregnant
table(Datos$PREGNANT)
```


```{r}
# Glucose
ggplot(Datos, aes(x = GLUCOSE)) + 
  geom_histogram(fill = "red", color = "black")

boxplotGlucosa <- boxplot(Datos$GLUCOSE)

ggplot(Datos) + 
  geom_boxplot(aes(y = GLUCOSE),fill = "red", color = "black") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = GLUCOSE),position = "jitter")

boxplotGlucosa$out
```
